resultItem.name: Cadence Blossom
resultItem.attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a blossom. If you listen carefully, you can hear the petals unfolding. At the end of the silent time, a blossom of Cadence finally bursts into bloom.

resultItem.name: Cadence Leaf
resultItem.attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a new leaf. If you listen carefully, you can hear the faint rustle of it bathing in sunlight and sucking dew. In fact, it is able to absorb the wandering Frequency Energy from the environment.

resultItem.name: Cadence Bud
resultItem.attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a plant bud. If you listen carefully, you can sense the pleasure of sprouting from the ground. However, it can never grow into a complete plant.

resultItem.name: Waveworn Residue 239
resultItem.attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. It is known for its astonishing balance. Due to its indispensable role in many high-tech fields, it is subject to the most stringent trade restrictions.

resultItem.name: Waveworn Residue 235
resultItem.attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. It maintains a delicate balance. When it is highly concentrated in a centrifuge, it produces products that have various applications.

resultItem.name: Waveworn Residue 226
resultItem.attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. It is not in a state of decline. By selecting an appropriate absorber, users may still have the chance to extract Remnant Energy.

resultItem.name: Presto Helix
resultItem.attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A helix with intense waveforms. Researchers are greatly captivated by the perfect harmony of movement and stillness it displays. However, to this day, no one knows how this harmony is formed.

resultItem.name: Andante Helix
resultItem.attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A helix with graceful waveforms, like a melodious song composed by nature. Instead of being studied by scientists, it might in essence be a subject best explored by researchers of aesthetics.

resultItem.name: Adagio Helix
resultItem.attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A helix with gentle waveforms. Researchers can extract and utilize the sealed Cadence Energy within it. However, it is worth mentioning that researchers cannot effectively analyze the content contained within this helix.

resultItem.name: Flawless Phlogiston
resultItem.attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A crystal shaped like a raging flame, known for its impeccable purity. As a result, some Resonators don't want to use these crystals solely for enhancement, instead opting to entrust professional craftsmen to process them into unique accessories.

resultItem.name: Refined Phlogiston
resultItem.attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A crystal shaped like a solidified firework. After repeated purification, it is almost free of impurities. Its eye-catching and magnificent appearance not only holds practical utility but also elevates its collectible value.

resultItem.name: Extracted Phlogiston
resultItem.attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A crystal shaped like a solidified candle flame. Its impurities are significantly reduced through a rough extraction and recrystallization process. This makes it simple even for those without expertise to distinguish between crystals of varying quality.

resultItem.name: Heterized Metallic Drip
resultItem.attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A special fluid metallic drip which can barely form naturally. It maintains a perpetual flow on its surface. Microscopic examinations of a few samples have revealed its intricate inner structure, resembling more of a living organism than an inorganic substance.

resultItem.name: Polarized Metallic Drip
resultItem.attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A fluid metallic drip with high activity. Its surface presents an amazing luster. This polarized matter only forms under extremely strict conditions, and the scientific world has yet to fully figure out its transformation patter.

resultItem.name: Reactive Metallic Drip
resultItem.attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
resultItem.bg_description: A fluid metallic drip whose activity has been partially retained. Its surface presents a luster similar to that of Tacetites. As it is quite reactive, it needs to be stored properly upon collection to prevent any loss of Frequency Energy.

resultItem.name: Mask of Insanity
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A very peculiar Fractsidus mask. It would be nearly impossible for a normal person to imagine the mental state of its owner. Judging from the residual frequency on the mask, one can perceive that the owner's emotions have become severely distorted, generating frequencies that resemble Tacet Discords.

resultItem.name: Mask of Distortion
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A mask worn by Fractsidus veterans. The original owner has now had no turning back on the road of Overclocking. Would they have chosen to wear this mask if they had foreseen all the torment and suffering that lay ahead?

resultItem.name: Mask of Erosion
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A mask worn by Fractsidus active members. Due to long-term use, its ability to stabilize frequency has been greatly mitigated. One can clearly feel the torment of being drowning in negative emotions from the mask.

resultItem.name: Tailored Ring
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A ring made of special material using unique techniques. Its owner must boast a legendary experience. Much of the information stored within it is encrypted and challenging to decipher for details.

resultItem.name: Improved Ring
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: An improved Ring, exclusive to a selected few. This ring stores a large amount of wilderness survival information. Certain entries detailing rare plants and special minerals hold academic significance compared to papers written by the Academy.

resultItem.name: Basic Ring
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A ring with bearable quality. Apart from helping the Exiles to recognize each other's identification, it also provides various functions such as basic communication, location services, and scanning. These features assist the Exiles to better survive in the wilderness.

resultItem.name: FF Howler Core
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: The Tacet Core of a special Howler. It takes the form of a seed emerging from a withered Tacetite Bloom. Life is brimming with endless possibilities. This core, akin to the seed of life, also contains infinite possibilities.

resultItem.name: HF Howler Core
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: The Tacet Core of a powerful Howler. The fierce and untamed Frequency Energy continues to reverberate within it. Evolution is all about adapting to the environment. Who will emerge victorious from the ordeal of the devastating Waveworm Phenomenon?

resultItem.name: MF Howler Core
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: The Tacet Core of a common Howler. After the Tacetite Bloom withers, a certain amount of Frequency Energy remains. Similar to the natural cycle of life, this frequency can probably serve as the sustenance for newcomers.

resultItem.name: FF Whisperin Core
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: The Tacet Core of a special Whisperin. It takes the form of an intricate star, bearing both recognizable and unfamiliar Frequency Energy. It seems that humans only know the tip of the iceberg of themselves.

resultItem.name: HF Whisperin Core
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: The Tacet Core of a powerful Whisperin. It takes the form of a star with sharp ridges along its outlineâ€”like an embodiment of its shrill Frequency Energy. Perhaps, its personification has already led to the Uncanny Valley effect.

resultItem.name: MF Whisperin Core
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: The Tacet Core of a common Whisperin. It takes the form of a clear and complete star. Its Frequency Energy aligns with the hearing range of normal people. Yet, the question remains: what's the intention behind this imitation?

resultItem.name: Fusion Resistance Spray
resultItem.attributes_description: Increases Fusion DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A pressurized canister spray filled using an advanced process that creates a special protective layer on the user's body surface to increase resistance to specified types of injuries.

resultItem.name: Basic Revival Inhaler
resultItem.attributes_description: Used to immediately revive and heal a selected downed Resonator for 100 HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.

resultItem.name: Medium Revival Inhaler
resultItem.attributes_description: Used to immediately revive and heal 10% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.

resultItem.name: Advanced Revival Inhaler
resultItem.attributes_description: Used to immediately revive and heal 25% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.

resultItem.name: Premium Revival Inhaler
resultItem.attributes_description: Used to immediately revive and heal 100% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.

resultItem.name: Basic Nutrient Block
resultItem.attributes_description: Used to heal 10% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 500 HP. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description:
A sugar cube supplement made from concentrated precious nutrients. Its active ingredients can be quickly absorbed by the human body.
Sweet and delicious, it's a favorite among children.

resultItem.attributes_description: Used to heal 15% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 1,000 HP. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description:
A sugar cube supplement made from concentrated precious nutrients. Its active ingredients can be quickly absorbed by the human body.
Sweet and delicious, it's a favorite among children.

resultItem.bg_description:

Sweet and delicious, it's a favorite among children.

resultItem.bg_description:
A sugar cube supplement made from concentrated precious nutrients. Its active ingredients can be quickly absorbed by the human body.
Sweet and delicious, it's a favorite among children.

resultItem.attributes_description: Used to heal a selected Resonator in the team for 100 HP per second over 30s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op.
resultItem.bg_description:
Portable liquid supplements filled using an advanced process that provides a quick and easy way to recharge and rejuvenate.

resultItem.bg_description:
Portable liquid supplements filled using an advanced process that provides a quick and easy way to recharge and rejuvenate.

resultItem.bg_description:
Portable liquid supplements filled using an advanced process that provides a quick and easy way to recharge and rejuvenate.
â€œAn energy supply in your pocket. A must-have for adventures."

resultItem.name: Supersonic Solvent
resultItem.attributes_description: Reduces Echo Skill Cooldown of a selected Resonator in the team by 30% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description:
A solid solvent made using a special process allows the user to use Echo Forte more frequently.
â€œI run faster after taking this, which means I must have gotten lighter, which means I have gotten thinner... So does it mean it's also a weight-loss product?â€

resultItem.name: Trainer Solvent
resultItem.attributes_description: Increases Echo Skill DMG of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description:
A solid solvent created using a special process that boosts the Echo Forte you cast.
Said to be invented by a self-proclaimed aspiring Echo Training Master.

resultItem.name: String Solvent
resultItem.attributes_description: Grants a selected Resonator in the team 1 Concerto Energy per second for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: Using a solid solvent made by a special process. Just one tablet can put the whole squad in a melodious melody and follow the music to finish the battle gracefully.

resultItem.name: Drummer Solvent
resultItem.attributes_description: Boosts Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: Using a solid solvent made by a special process. Just one table can make the entire squad's ears ring with a thrilling rhythm, as if they were holding drumsticks instead of weapons.

resultItem.name: Morale Tablets
resultItem.attributes_description: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to additionally reduce the Vibration Strength of the targets by a certain percentage when they trigger Counterattack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

resultItem.name: Harmony Tablets
resultItem.attributes_description: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to regain 20 Concerto Energy when releasing Intro Skill within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

resultItem.name: Passion Tablets
resultItem.attributes_description: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to regain 5 Resonance Energy when they successfully Dodge an attack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

resultItem.name: Vigor Tablets
resultItem.attributes_description: Grants a selected Resonator in the team immunity to the next fatal damage and heals 25% of the Resonator's Max HP, lasting for 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

resultItem.name: Base Fluid
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
resultItem.bg_description: It is widely used as a base liquid in various preparations.

resultItem.name: Fluid Catalyst
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
resultItem.bg_description: Catalytic fluids that can accelerate the onset of action of all types of potions.

resultItem.name: Fluid Stabilizer
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
resultItem.bg_description: Stabilizing fluids that improve the reliability of all types of potions.

resultItem.name: Strong Fluid Catalyst
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
resultItem.bg_description: Powerful catalytic fluids that can significantly accelerate the onset of action of all types of formulations.

resultItem.name: Strong Fluid Stabilizer
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
resultItem.bg_description: Strong stabilizing fluids that significantly improve the reliability of all types of potions.

resultItem.name: Sonar Circuit
resultItem.attributes_description: Can be used to activate the Casket Sonar's search and pinpointing functions for special collectibles.
resultItem.bg_description: The most basic structure to artificially reproduce or store Remnant frequency. It allows the Casket Sonar to match the frequencies around with the Remnant information within its storage to locate special collectibles.

resultItem.name: Waypoint Module
resultItem.attributes_description: Used to activate the search function of Waypoint.
resultItem.bg_description: The core module of the Waypoint, responsible for collecting, sharing, and updating location information. It connects the Waypoint and the Resonance Beacon, making it essential for initiating and maintaining the functioning of the Waypoint.

resultItem.name: Basic Energy Core
resultItem.attributes_description: Provides 1,000 Weapon EXP.
resultItem.bg_description: Purified liquid energy extracted from Tacetite, its purity increasing with higher ratings. When injected into a weapon, it offers a corresponding bonus.

resultItem.name: Medium Energy Core
resultItem.attributes_description: Provides 3,000 Weapon EXP.
resultItem.bg_description: A supplement storing a small amount of Tacetite Energy. It can be used to recharge the core modules of Tacetite Weapons. Routine preventative maintenance of weapons is advised for all Resonators, or they may find themselves caught off guard in the case of an emergency.

resultItem.name: Basic Sealed Tube
resultItem.attributes_description: Basic Echo EXP item. Provides 500 EXP.
resultItem.bg_description: A cylindrical storage that contains simplified frequency cluster. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. Resonators can then extract its data using their Terminal, employing it to optimize the performance of the absorbed Echoes.

resultItem.name: Medium Sealed Tube
resultItem.attributes_description: Medium Echo EXP item. Provides 1,000 EXP.
resultItem.bg_description: A cylindrical storage that contains standard frequencies. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. This medium-sized storage holds a greater volume of information compared to the basic version. Consequently, the database available for training is more complete, better optimizing the performance of the absorbed Echoes.

resultItem.name: Advanced Tuner
resultItem.attributes_description: A device for Tuning 4-star Echoes. Unlocks one Substat.
resultItem.bg_description: Adjust Echoes' frequencies, remove any noise, and unleash their true potential.

resultItem.name: Premium Tuner
resultItem.attributes_description: A device for Tuning 5-star Echoes. Unlocks one Substat.
resultItem.bg_description: Adjust Echoes' frequencies, remove any noise, and unleash their true potential.

resultItem.name: Fusion-resistant Spray
resultItem.attributes_description: Within 180s, deal DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses to increase Fusion DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 10s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

resultItem.bg_description: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

resultItem.bg_description: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

resultItem.bg_description: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

resultItem.bg_description: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

resultItem.name: Havoc-resistant Spray
resultItem.attributes_description: Within 180s, deal DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses to increase Havoc DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 10s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
resultItem.bg_description: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

resultItem.name: FF Polygon Core
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A robust polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. The polygonal structure shows a tendency to expand outwards, likely because of the lack of capacity for storing the growingly complex logic in the behaviors of a Tacet Discord.

resultItem.name: HF Polygon Core
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A robust polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. The concentric layers spiral inward in dense steps. It's deduced the density of its pattern correlates with the complexity of the Tacet Discord's behavioral patterns.

resultItem.name: MF Polygon Core
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A common polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. The spiral structure is fairly complete. Seems to be an analog circuit recording the behavioral patterns of a Tacet Discord.

resultItem.name: FF Tidal Residuum
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A unique formation resembling a tide-breaking vessel, found only on a few powerful Tacet Discords in Rinascita. Legend say Tacet Discords bearing this Residuum can chart the course to the Journeying Paradise.

resultItem.name: HF Tidal Residuum
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A robust formation resembling a sailing ship, occasionally found on certain Tacet Discords in Rinascita. Legend say Tacet Discords with this Residuum can hear the distant echoes of the Dark Tide.

resultItem.name: MF Tidal Residuum
resultItem.attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
resultItem.bg_description: A common formation resembling a storm-weathered boat, often found on Tacet Discords in Rinascita, which are said to be born of the Dark Tide and carry this Residuum since their formation.
